item.title: Lagg
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

@Tom, I meant more community based problems.
I’m not blaming staff etc just saying what I feel its like(about staff) - if it doesn’t go with what they have previously done then it’ll be disregarded, its like you can’t make whoever it is say like oh yeah thats right/oh yeah i was wrong/i made a mistake etc.
But meh, maybe I’m just the wrong one as it isn’t just one staff member. I’m bad at explaining things^

Read full topic

item.title: Lagg
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:12, topic:439283”][quote author=Berky-Scape link=topic=541985.msg3970918#msg3970918 date=1334141316]
Am I the only one lagging so badly when entering Moparscape?
[/quote]

I’ve had a few issues since Moparisthebest started using cloudflare, such as random spots of downtime, and for me at least the site has gone a tiny bit slower. Apart from that the only time the forum stops for me is when someone is being banned but that’s usually only for ~10 seconds.

I’ve already messaged him about a few issues since he started using cloudflare. I’m certain it’ll get sorted as time goes on ;D

[quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=541985.msg3971137#msg3971137 date=1334169750]

Looks like mopman is banning peopleeee!
[/quote]now wouldn’t that be a change?

I don’t think any of you truly appreciate how hard Mopman works for this community, all the attention is diverged to other staff. If a new member of this community were to go on the IRC today, and request help from Mopman, hand on heart, Mopman would gladly assist him.

If you ever need help I’d strongly suggest you go to Mopman over any other admin - He gets the job done.

[/quote]thats lothy idiet

Read full topic
